Sentencas: The patterned nickel (Ni) electrode enables to quantify the triple-phase boundary (TPB) length and Ni surface area as well as exclude the interference of bulk gas diffusion.
Titulo: Reversible H2/H2O electrochemical conversion mechanisms on the patterned nickel electrodes

Sentencas: In this study, the patterned Ni electrodes are investigated in both the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) modes at the atmosphere of H2O/H-2.
Titulo: Reversible H2/H2O electrochemical conversion mechanisms on the patterned nickel electrodes

Sentencas: The experimental test shows the patterned Ni electrode keeps stable and intact only at the specific operating condition due to instability of Ni at the H2O-containing atmosphere.
Titulo: Reversible H2/H2O electrochemical conversion mechanisms on the patterned nickel electrodes

Sentencas: The effects of the temperature, partial pressure of H2O and H-2 on the electrochemical performance are measured.
Titulo: Reversible H2/H2O electrochemical conversion mechanisms on the patterned nickel electrodes

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance has a positive correlation with the temperature, partial pressure of H-2 and H2O. Further, the experimental results are compared with the mechanism containing two-step charge-transfer reaction used in the existing literature.
Titulo: Reversible H2/H2O electrochemical conversion mechanisms on the patterned nickel electrodes

Sentencas: An analytical calculation is performed to indicate the rate-limiting steps may be different for SOFC and SOEC modes.
Titulo: Reversible H2/H2O electrochemical conversion mechanisms on the patterned nickel electrodes

Sentencas: In SOFC mode, H-2 electrochemical oxidation could be dominated by both charge transfer reaction at low polarization voltage and by the charge transfer reaction H(Ni) +
Titulo: Reversible H2/H2O electrochemical conversion mechanisms on the patterned nickel electrodes
